text: Radio Mirraya 101 FM, is a radio station based in Juba owned by United Nations mission in South Sudan. It began broadcasting in South Sudan on June 30, 2006. It provides news and information 24 hours, 7 days a week in English and Arabic. It is the fifth UN radio station operating on behalf of UN peace operation in 2006. ==References== Category:Radio stations in South Sudan Category:Radio stations established in 2006 Category:2006 establishments in Africa Category:News and talk radio stations Category:English-language radio stations Category:Arabic-language radio stations
title: Radio Mirraya
